TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PasswordEncodingMethod extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether SSL is used when you set or change a password. This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntryConfiguration.PasswordEncoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.PasswordEncodingMethod PasswordEncodingClear = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Passwords are not encoded and are transmitted in plain text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.PasswordEncodingMethod PasswordEncodingSsl = int32(0)
